tokenizer_name = bert-base-uncased
model_type = bert
block_size = 126

do_train = True
train_data_file = data/wiki103-cased/wiki.train.raw
do_eval = True
eval_data_file = data/wiki103-cased/wiki.valid.raw
col_data = True
split_sent = True
shuffle = True
mlm = True

per_gpu_train_batch_size = 64
per_gpu_eval_batch_size = 64
gradient_accumulation_steps = 1
max_steps = 100000
learning_rate = 2e-4
weight_decay = 0.01
warmup_steps = 10000

logging_steps = 1000
ckpt_steps = 1000

should_continue = True
